price: 40. A korosey sin Rabbi lab xaylot sin cagliseeh siinih dooree, isi nafsih malayka say xayloh haysitak? diggah isin qaxumaane как nabah tan maxco ittan malayka Yallih say xaylo ittan waqdi.
arabic: أَفَأَصۡفَىٰكُمۡ رَبُّكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ وَٱتَّخَذَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنَٰثًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَقُولُونَ قَوۡلًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afa-aṣfākum rabbukum bil-banīna wa-ittakhadha mina al-malāikati ināthan innakum lataqūlūna qawlan ʿaẓīman
translations: Then has your Lord chosen (for) you
Then has your Lord chosen (for) you
